message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You can't be serious with 50/50, I'm the one making the next offer!
I'm willing to give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of!
You're not willing to give me a better deal, so I'll try to take it all!
I'm not going to let you take it all, I'll try to make a better offer!
You're getting desperate, I can smell it!
I'm not giving up yet, I'll try to make a better offer!
You're running out of time, and I'm running out of patience!
I'm not giving up yet, I'll try to make a better offer before it's too late!
You're getting close to losing everything, don't say I didn't warn you!
I'm not giving up yet, I'll try to make a better offer before it's too late!
This is my last offer, take it or leave it!
